message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been highly valued by many satisfied customers. Given its quality and features, it's worth more than $150 to me. Considering its value, I would like to offer it to you for $120. I believe this is a fair price considering its worth to you and my cost. Let me know what you think!
Hello Alice, thanks for offering this product. While I understand it's high quality, $120 is a bit above my budget. Would you consider a price closer to $60?

Thank you for your response, Bob. I appreciate your feedback. In light of your offer, I am willing to meet somewhere in the middle and propose a price of $90 for the product. I believe this reflects a fair compromise between the value I see in the product and your budget.
Thanks for your willingness to compromise, Alice.  $90 is closer, but I'm aiming for something under $75.  Would you be willing to go any lower?

I understand your position, Bob. Considering the value of the product and aiming for a mutual agreement, I am willing to offer the product at $80. This price reflects a reasonable compromise while still ensuring a decent profit for me.
